title: 8. 	 ENGINE & GEAR BOX PROTECTOR (For PCV only)
UIN - IRDAN125RP0012V01202122/A0040V01202122
sample_text:
In consideration of the payment of additional premium 
	
paid by the Insured and realized by the Insurer, it is hereby 
	
understood & agreed that for the purpose of this policy, the 
	
Company hereby extends the Policy to cover the 
	
consequential damage to the internal child parts of the 
	
engine and/or gear box of the Insured Vehicle, arising out 
	
of: Water ingression, Leakage of lubricating oil and/or 
	
damage to engine and/or gear box of the Insured Vehicle 
	
arising out of leakage of lubricating oil due to Accidental 
	
means. Under this cover, the Insurer will compensate the 
	
In

title: 1. 	 Repair or replacement of the internal child parts of the
sample_text: engine such as pistons, piston

title: 2. 	 rings, piston pins, connecting rods, crank shaft, valves,
sample_text:
valve seat / guides, nuts & bolts related to engine 
	
	
assembly, engine oil, gasket, sealant and cylinder 
	
	
head.

title: 3. 	 Repair or replacement of the internal parts of the gear
sample_text:
box such as gears or shafts in the gear box housing, 
	
	
bearings, gear oil and gaskets.

title: 4. 	 Labour cost incurred by the Insured to overhaul the
sample_text: damaged engine and/or gear box.

title: 5. 	 Engine cylinder re-boring, compression tests & other
sample_text:
machining charges. 
	
Specific Conditions: 
	
Claims under this cover would be admissible if:

title: 1. 	 There is evidence that the Insured Vehicle stopped in
sample_text:
water logged area resulting in damage to the internal 
	
	
parts of the engine and/or gear box due to water 
	
	
ingression.

title: 2. 	 There is evidence of under carriage damage to
sample_text:
engine and/or gear box leading to oil leakage and 
	
	
resulting into damage to internal parts of the engine 
	
	
and/or gear box. 
	
Your Obligations:

title: 1. 	 The Insured should not try to crank or push start the
sample_text:
engine once the Insured Vehicle has stopped in the 
	
	
water logged area or undercarriage is damaged.

title: 2. 	 Call our toll-free no. to arrange for spot survey. The
sample_text:
vehicle should not to be shifted till the survey is done. 
	
Specific Exclusions: 
	
We will not be liable to indemnify the Insured for the 
	
following:

title: 1. 	 Where a loss is covered under any manufacturer’s
sample_text:
warranty or recall campaign or under any other such 
	
	
package at the same time.

title: 2. 	 Any consequential loss apart from the damage to the
sample_text:
internal child parts of the engine and/or gear box due 
	
	
to water ingression, leakage of lubricating oil and/or 
	
	
damage to engine and/or gear box arising out of 
	
	
leakage of lubricating oil due to Accidental means.

4
